org.futurist.util

Class DelimitedFileConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.futurist.util.DelimitedFileConverter

  • public class DelimitedFileConverter
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DelimitedFileConverter(java.lang.String inFile, java.lang.String inDelimiter, java.lang.String outFile, java.lang.String outDelimiter)
      Default constructor that takes an existing file originally delimited with the given string and writes its contents to a new file with another given string delimiter.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void convert()
      Convert the file by replacing all occurrences of the input delimiter with the output delimiter.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • DelimitedFileConverter

        public DelimitedFileConverter(java.lang.String inFile,
                      java.lang.String inDelimiter,
                      java.lang.String outFile,
                      java.lang.String outDelimiter)
        Default constructor that takes an existing file originally delimited with the given string and writes its contents to a new file with another given string delimiter.
        Parameters:
        inFile - the existing file (including its extension) originally delimited with the given string
        inDelimiter - the string delimiter for the given existing file
        outFile - the name of the new file to create (including its extension)
        outDelimiter - the string delimiter for the new file to be created

    • Method Detail

      • convert

        public void convert()
        Convert the file by replacing all occurrences of the input delimiter with the output delimiter. Writes the contents to the file name given in the constructor.
